text: Peter Koning (born 3 December 1990) is a Dutch professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . Koning has been a member of the squad since the 2019 season. He was named in the startlist for the 2017 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2007 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2012 : 1st 20px Time trial, National Under-23 Road Championships : 5th Ronde van Midden-Nederland : 7th Overall Olympia's Tour ;2013 : 2nd Overall Olympia's Tour : 5th Rabo Baronie Breda Classic ;2014 : 1st Stage 1 (TTT) Czech Cycling Tour : 4th Overall Okolo Slovenska ::1st Stage 1 (TTT) : 5th Duo Normand (with Brian van Goethem) ;2016 : 1st Grote Prijs Beeckman-De Caluwé : 1st Stage 3 Tour de San Luis : 4th Overall Tour of Iran (Azerbaijan) ::1st Stage 2 ;2018 : 1st 20px Mountains classification Tour of Croatia ;2019 : 1st 20px Overall Tour of Mersin ::1st Stage 3 : 7th Overall Tour of Mesopotamia : 7th PWZ Zuidenveld Tour ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2017 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text- align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |141 |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch male cyclists Category:People from Venhuizen Category:Sportspeople from North Holland Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Peter Koning
